title: 1910's Japanese PCs of McGraw and White
author: glenv

posts.post_title: 1910's Japanese PCs of McGraw and White
posts.post_content:
Both postcards for $350 shipped.  McGraw has Japanese characters written neatly on the back.  Both postcards have a slight warp to them.  They measure 6.5" x 3.5".

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=316989&d=1526852452[/IMG]  [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=316990&d=1526852459[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=316991&d=1526852465[/IMG]  [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=316992&d=1526852472[/IMG]
